ComicInfo.Series: The Deadly Hands of Kung Fu
ComicInfo.Title: Two Goals To Seek, One Path To Glory; The Casket of Hsien Hang!; The Blitzkrieg of Batroc!
ComicInfo.Summary: Shang-Chi, Master of Kung Fu has his goals set and will stop at nothing to achieve them in “Two Goals to Seek, One Path to Glory!”
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 17:14:14. [Issue ID 27824]
ComicInfo.Writer: Doug Moench,Mary Skrenes,Stan Lee,Doug Moench,Mary Skrenes,Stan Lee
ComicInfo.Penciller: Barry Windsor-Smith,Dick Giordano,Frank McLaughlin,Jack Kirby,Keith Pollard,Paul Gulacy,Keith Pollard,Paul Gulacy,Jack Kirby
ComicInfo.Inker: Barry Windsor-Smith,Bob McLeod,Dick Giordano,Duffy Vohland,Frank McLaughlin,Frank Giacoia,Bob McLeod,Duffy Vohland,Frank Giacoia
ComicInfo.Letterer: Denise Wohl,Tom Orzechowski,Sam Rosen,Tom Orzechowski,Denise Wohl,Sam Rosen
